channel.title: [DELTA NOT DEVO] How do I make NPC's talk outloud? [DELTA NOT DEVO]
channel.description:
[shadow=red,left]USING DELTA SOURCE NOT DEVOLUTION 7.0[/shadow]
Hi guys :D
I was wondering how I would make (ie) The Wise Old Man (2253) talk?
I know in DEVOLUTION you go to npcHandler.java and search for a sentence and it would be there.
But with DELTA it doesnt seem to be in there,
Can someone tell me what the code is? [b]AND WHERE TO PUT IT[/b] That'd be great

item.title: [DELTA NOT DEVO] How do I make NPC's talk outloud? [DELTA NOT DEVO]
item.dc:creator: @freakinlost freakinlost

Hi guys

I was wondering how I would make (ie) The Wise Old Man (2253) talk?

I know in DEVOLUTION you go to npcHandler.java and search for a sentence and it would be there.

But with DELTA it doesnt seem to be in there,

Can someone tell me what the code is? AND WHERE TO PUT IT That’d be great

[/quote]
hey i got a link, because i fixed mine, here ill pm you link (its not on this website) so i dont wanna get banned.[/quote]

umm this is an old topic don’t bother replying didn’t realize till i read the dates

item.title: [DELTA NOT DEVO] How do I make NPC's talk outloud? [DELTA NOT DEVO]
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“strn00b, post:2, topic:283790”]i need to know this too.[/quote]This topic is from June.

[quote=“Trent!!, post:3, topic:283790”]npcspeech.cfg
add on…

speech = //NPC ID                    20                           1                         //WHAT YOU WANT IT TO SAY

that should be right. if not. i have no idea[/quote]
The topic creator was last active in August.

Read full topic

item.description:

freakinlost:

not sure what kind of server delta is but 317 is in npchandler.java and 508s are npc.java (i don’t know if its all) and i don’t know what 525s are… but i hope that helped ;D

Deltascape is Devolution V6

item.title: [DELTA NOT DEVO] How do I make NPC's talk outloud? [DELTA NOT DEVO]
item.dc:creator: @Trent1 Trent!!
item.description:
@Trent1 wrote:

npcspeech.cfg
add on…

speech = //NPC ID                    20                           1                         //WHAT YOU WANT IT TO SAY

that should be right. if not. i have no idea
